Utility First Framework

Build greatusing Tailwind

Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows developers to design custom user interfaces efficiently

Look how cool Tailwind CSS is

As a utility-first CSS framework, it provides low-level utility classes that allow developers to build custom designs without being constrained by pre-defined components. With over 675,375 websites using Tailwind CSS

Hey everyone! Feel free to clone my project. Just a heads-up—this site is for learning purposes, so I wouldn't recommend adding it to your resume directly. However, if you're-create it with added new features, feel free to include it. Thanks!
